name: Leeching Bite
originalText: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

rulings.text: You need to be able to choose two different target creatures in order to cast Leeching Bite.
If only one of the targeted creatures is still a legal target when Leeching Bite tries to resolve, that creature will still be affected, but the illegal target won’t be.

text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
